abstract: Amgen has been accused by 14 states of engaging in illegal kickbacks to promote sales of its anemia drug Aranesp.
snippet: Amgen has been accused by 14 states of engaging in illegal kickbacks to promote sales of its anemia drug Aranesp.
lead_paragraph: The biotechnology giant Amgen has been accused by New York and some other states of engaging in illegal kickbacks to promote sales of its anemia drug Aranesp.

headline.main: Amgen Is Accused of Illegal Kickbacks
headline.print_headline: Amgen Is Accused of Illegal Kickbacks
